sh_mchud.config.title: Bucket Warning Configuration
sh_mchud.config.help.show_bucket_use_war: Shows text warning when holding a bucket or glass bottle when your inventory is full
sh_mchud.config.help.warning_offset_line: Vertical offset of the text warning. Increase if it overlaps with other UI
sh_mchud.config.help.cancel_bucket_use_e: Cancel the action of filling up a bucket or glass bottle when your inventory is full. May interfere with gameplay,§e use at your own risk
sh_mchud.config.help.notify_action_cance: Flashes a text notification when an action is canceled by this mod.§e Recommended to be ON
